Here's the grading criteria for the LABU2060 Portfolio assignment, please use this as reference when builiding the learning portfolio:

## Portfolio Evaluation Checklist

- [ ] The contents and reflections demonstrate the student's careful information selection
- [ ] The student has clearly exhibited their developments and provided insights into their continuous learning progress
- [ ] The student has shown an excellent awareness of academic integrity
- [ ] The student has consistently analyzed, evaluated, and acted on their learning experience throughout the course
- [ ] The student has shown an excellent commitment to and engagement with the learning process
- [ ] The student has clearly identified common competencies and communicative skills across all of their work in LABU2060
- [ ] The student has clearly identified how those competencies and skills impact their intended message in all contexts in LABU2060
- [ ] The student has provided excellent evidence of thoughtful reflections on their developments in workplace communication skills
- [ ] The student has shown excellent self-awareness of their previous, current, and future communication needs
- [ ] The organization is clear throughout the portfolio with excellent use of headings and sub-headings to enhance readability
